summary: "Reputation" is Taylor Swift's sixth album, released in 2017. She made it to respond to people judging her private life. The songs tell a story about love and revenge. It's an electropop and R&B album with hip hop and EDM influences. Swift didn't do many interviews to promote it, but she did get a lot of attention by clearing her website and social media. The album was a big success, selling over a million copies in its first week and winning many awards. Critics liked her songwriting but had mixed feelings about the music and themes.
title: Reputation (album)
